name: Charged Shard
description: Shard containing raw elemental energy
use: useful for alchemy or power cores.

name: Arcane Thread
description: Strands of inert magic from old relics
use: useful for scrolls or wands.

name: Abyssal Power Cell
description: Black orb humming with corrupt energy
use: useful for dangerous or unstable devices.

name: Ebon Amber
description: Black crystal infused with faint light
use: can be refined into rare spell foci.

name: Scaled Frog Legs
description: Common amphibian found in rivers and ponds
use: useful for alchemy or food.

name: Netherstone Fragment
description: Corrupted stone pulsing with abyssal power
use: useful for dark enchantments or artifacts.

name: Nether Bat Wing
description: Abyssal creature found near corrupted ruins
use: useful for alchemy or enchantments.

name: Echo Core
description: Crystal that hums with memory magic
use: useful for illusion or divination gear.

name: Sunfruit
description: Common tropical fruit near Jiggow
use: useful for food and basic potions.

name: Starlit Fungi
description: Bioluminescent fungus deep in forests
use: useful for glowing potions or lightsources.

name: Wild Turkey Meat
description: Common game from the coastal roads and jungle edges
use: useful for cooking and rations.

name: Dreamfruit
description: Fruit from dream-touched trees
use: can induce visions or restore spell slots.

name: Aether Crystal
description: Pure condensed mana crystal
use: useful for storing spell energy.

name: Shadowpanther Pelt
description: Abyss-touched predator’s hide
use: useful for stealth gear or enchanted leather.

name: Bent Gear
description: Common mechanical scrap from carts or tools
use: useful for basic tinkering.

name: Salt Crystal
description: Found near caves and coastal cliffs
use: useful for preservation or alchemy.

name: Bronzeshade Vein
description: Strong alloy-rich ore from rocky tunnels
use: useful for durable weapon crafting.

name: Umbral Cap
description: Pitch-black fungus feeding on darkness
use: used in shadow magic or stealth potions.

name: Living Metal Sliver
description: Animated shard of self-moving metal
use: useful for self-repairing constructs or armor.

name: Heartmoss
description: Dark, creeping moss that forms lumpy nodules shaped vaguely like hearts, pulsing faintly.
use: can amplify healing or harm depending on use.

name: Rootcap Mushroom
description: Common ground fungus near shaded trails
use: useful for basic stews or tonics.

name: Whisper Quartz
description: Faintly humming mineral near magical fields
use: useful for storing minor magic.

name: Lumen Ore
description: Softly glowing mineral from deeper caverns
use: useful for light-based gear or enchantments.

name: Steamcore Fragment
description: Small power core from defunct constructs
use: useful for powering tinkered items.

name: Thunderbird Feather
description: From rare jungle birds prized by hunters
use: materials for magical arrows or charms.

name: Echo Sap
description: Thick, dark amber sap that clings to fingers and faintly echoes nearby sounds.
use: can amplify healing or harm depending on use.

name: Iron Shard
description: Common metal along the cliffs of Jiggow
use: useful for forging or trade.

name: Jade Pebble
description: Small decorative stone found in riverbeds
use: useful for jewelry or currency.

name: Vermilion Fern
description: Delicate fern with bright red fronds that seem warm to the touch.
use: useful for resistance potions or vitality draughts.

name: Nether Spore
description: Corrupted fungus exuding red mist
use: useful for toxic concoctions or curse brews.

name: Nether Essence
description: Essence of corrupted planar energy
use: useful for dark or experimental enchantments.

name: Spicebulb
description: Spicy root bulb with magical aroma
use: useful for powerful cooking or stimulant draughts.

name: Runed Cog
description: Metal gear etched with faint runes
use: useful for clockwork or enchanted tools.

name: Residual Mana Dust
description: Faint traces of spent magic in trinkets
use: useful for minor enchantments.

name: Heart of the Earth
description: Pulsing core of condensed elemental energy
use: legendary crafting material for armor or golems.

name: Cracked Gem Core
description: Small, unstable magical gem fragment
use: useful for crafting or alchemy catalysts.

name: Jungle Boar Hide
description: Common game from the coastal roads and jungle edges
use: useful for simple leather or cooking.

name: Dewlight Bulb
description: Plump, pale bulb that beads with cool, glowing droplets at dusk.
use: useful for resistance potions or vitality draughts.

name: Echoing Gear
description: Mechanical gear that resonates faintly with sound
use: useful for sonic or resonance items.

name: Marrowleaf
description: Small pale-green leaves with white, bone-like veins and a faint herbal scent.
use: can make simple poultices or minor healing salves.

name: Glowmoss
description: Soft mats of pale moss that emit a gentle greenish glow in darkness.
use: can make simple poultices or minor healing salves.

name: Binding Sigil Fragment
description: Piece of a broken sealing rune
use: useful for barrier or warding magic.

name: Worn Mechanism
description: Broken gear or hinge from old machines
use: useful for repair or crafting parts.

name: Ghostcap
description: Translucent mushroom glowing faintly at night
use: useful for invisibility or illusion brews.

name: Eldritch Carapace
description: Armor plates from twisted aberrations
use: useful for crafting resilient armors.

name: Drift Berries
description: Bright berries found along riverbanks
use: useful for dyes or food.

name: Corrupted Rune Shard
description: Fragment of a cursed rune stone
use: useful for cursed or necrotic artifacts.

name: Netherbloom
description: Black-violet flower whose petals shimmer with an eerie inner light.
use: can amplify healing or harm depending on use.

name: Ironvine
description: Tough, dark green vine with a faint metallic sheen along its surface.
use: useful for resistance potions or vitality draughts.

name: Glowfang Venison
description: From nocturnal glowing deer-like beasts
use: materials for exotic meals or light potions.

name: Enchanted Spring
description: Metal spring infused with magic tension
use: useful for traps or repeating mechanisms.

name: Bitterroot
description: Knotted brown root with a sharp, bitter taste that numbs the tongue.
use: can make simple poultices or minor healing salves.

name: Scrap Iron Plate
description: Rusted armor piece or metal sheet
use: useful for reforging.

name: Crimson Basilisk Scales
description: Found deeper in the jungle or cliffsides
use: materials for armor or rare potions.

name: Wild Turkey Feather
description: Long, iridescent feather plucked from a wild turkey, banded with earthy brown and cream stripes.
use: Used for arrow fletching, small talismans, quills, or decorative accents on cloaks and hats.

name: Boar Hide
description: Thick strip of boar hide, rough and bristled, with a strong musky scent and tough outer layer.
use: Useful for crafting leather armor, sturdy straps, shield padding, or trade goods.

name: Weaver’s Thread
description: Fine, tightly spun thread, surprisingly strong for its thinness, usually wound around a small wooden spindle.
use: Used in tailoring and repairs, reinforcing seams in clothing, armor padding, or binding small charms and spell foci.

name: Set of small gears and wires.
description: Assorted tiny brass gears, screws, and thin insulated wires salvaged from broken devices and clockwork.
use: Essential for repairing simple mechanisms, crafting gadgets, traps, or augmenting arcane-technological items.
